name: Fighters Unleashed
description: Fighters Unleashed is an old school Beat'em up game with a modern look and feel, combos, ninjas, soldiers, zombies, and more. Are you good enought to unleash your power ??
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB Storage: 500 MB available space
